testcase.name: S.1.7.(a) - Filing indicator value in scope of the module
testcase.description: The filing indicator element value MUST indicate the reporting unit ("template") that is in scope of the referenced entry point schema file ("module").

variation.description: XBRL instance with filing indicators for a given module (one declared with @find:filed="true", one without and one @find:filed="false").
XBRL with a positive filing indicator (without @find:filed="true") for a template outside of a module.
XBRL with a positive filing indicator (with @find:filed="true") for a template outside of a module.
XBRL with a negative filing indicator (with @find:filed="false") for a template outside of a module.
